description: In their search for Marco Rochelles missing boyfriend, Lucas henchmen, mega-hung Chad Hunt and husky Mario Ortiz, decide to make a stop at Rochelles to ask some questions. The trio ends up taking part in an eight-man orgy with Damion, Tag Adams, Jay Black, Alejandro Cosme and Felipe Eller that accumulates in a stunning dick-sucking pyramid that must be seen to believe.
title: Vengeance 2 Orgy
